page.title: 15Sunday in Allenton, Derby
page.content: On Sunday I get up and go for the papers from T.C.News When I get back my breakfast is ready. I usually have bacon and eggs and beans. Then at about half past nine I walk round to Sunday School. We listen to stories, sing songs and do quizzes. I am there until eleven o'clock. Then I run home to get ready to go trampolining. I go to the Shaftesbury Centre in Normanton. At a quarter to twelve I meet my friend at the top of the street. When I come back my Sunday dinner is ready. We usually eat roast beef with vegetables and afterwards we have apple pie and custard. Then I play outside in the garden.If it's raining I play in my bedroom with my Barbie and Sindy dolls. At night we usually watch a video then have a bath and go to bed.
